resources.string: Main Screen - this displays a list of playlists or song categories classified by mood. This uses ListView and ArrayAdapter to display the list. When clicked on any list item, PlaylistActivity (next screen) is launched with songs related to that mood.

Playlist Screen - this displays a list of songs based on the mood chosen in MainActivity screen. This uses ListView and ArrayAdapter to display the list. When clicked on any list item, MediaActivity (next screen) is launched to listen to the song.

Media Screen - this displays selected song details, media controls to play, pause and stop the song, and a seekbar to show song\'s progress. Play/Pause functionality are handled by a single button. Stop button stops the media and returns to PlaylistActivity. This screen uses Media Player class and Runnable Interface to implement the above functionality.
